sect2.para: Implements the boolean logic function out = NOT in. Inverts all the bits input stream.

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

row.entry: Sets the input and output to integer (signed, 32-bit) values.
Sets the input and output to short (signed, 16-bit) values.
Sets the input and output to byte (unsigned, 8-bit) values.
